import{HttpClient}from"../network/http";export class userService extends HttpClient{async testing(data){try{return await this.axiosFetch("/test",{method:"post",body:data});}catch(err){throw err;}}async handleRequestFriend(data){try{return await this.axiosFetch(`/request/friend/response`,{method:"post",body:data});}catch(err){throw err;}}// 친구요청
async requestFriend(data){try{return await this.axiosFetch(`/request/friend`,{method:"post",body:data});}catch(err){throw err;}}// 유저 정보 얻기
async getUser(){try{return await this.axiosFetch("/current",{method:"get"});}catch(err){throw err;}}// 유저 정보 겹치는것 체크
async OverlapCheck(data){try{return await this.axiosFetch("/overlap_check",{method:"post",body:data});}catch(err){throw err;}}//회원가입 유저정보 보내기
async sendUserInfo(data){try{return await this.axiosFetch(`/user_info`,{method:"post",body:data});}catch(err){throw err;}}// 인증코드 재전송
async resendAuthcode(data){try{return await this.axiosFetch("/send_authcode",{method:"post",body:data});}catch(err){throw err;}}// 회원가입
async account(data){try{return await this.axiosFetch("/account",{method:"post",body:data});}catch(err){throw err;}}// 로그인
async sendLoginInfo(data){try{return await this.axiosFetch("/login",{method:"post",body:data});}catch(err){throw err;}}}export const user_service=new userService();
